jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:33): morning  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:34): is this FAQ answer still accurate with 1.9 - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/IsThereAWayToRenameAPage ?  
sdumitriu - (03/05/2009 15:35): No  
sdumitriu - (03/05/2009 15:35): There's the rename entry in the top menu  
sdumitriu - (03/05/2009 15:35): Under "Actions"  
sdumitriu - (03/05/2009 15:38): Updated the FAQ  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:39): okay, good to know...   
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:39): I think I tried the rename function and it was not 100%  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:40): I'll test some more  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:40): what version was that functionality introduced?  
sdumitriu - (03/05/2009 15:41): 1.0  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:42): oh  
jumpkick - (03/05/2009 15:42): okay
